events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund since it does not match what I ordered.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request for an incorrectly sent product.
Assigning the case to refund department agent specialized in handling return requests.
Hello, this is Sarah from support. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request for the wrong product.
Could you please provide your order number and photos of the product you received to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. I have attached photos showing the incorrect item delivered to my address.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund and provide you with a return shipping label shortly.
Great, I appreciate your quick response and clear instructions on returning the item for a refund.
The refund process has been completed, and the return label was sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are following up to ensure that you received your refund and that everything was satisfactory with our resolution.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day.
